reviews.customers_say: Customers find the turtleneck sweater well-fitting, soft, and incredibly comfortable, appreciating its warm, thin material and good value.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft Expensive Appearance
items.body: Wow! Very good quality! Soft with large ribbing. Appears expensive. Feels velvety. Would wear alone or under a blazer. XL Fits good. Not loose or too tight. 5’3” 185 lbs. carry weight in mid section, usually wear torrid 12-14, shirts 0. Black/burgundy/taupe great colors. Will buy other colors and for gifts! Read more
items.author: Melisa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for layering
items.body: Very soft, attractive fit. I'm a big girl and love the fit, feel and look if the turtleneck sweater. It IS a thinner sweater perfect for layering. I'd like a few more of the colors Read more
items.author: Wendy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Light colors
items.body: Soft and cozy. The color is much lighter than the pictures which i don’t mind. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with purchase
items.body: I’m so happy with these turtlenecks that I’ve been wearing on every day. They are soft, fitted but not too tight and lightweight but not too lightweight. Read more
items.author: Wendi Janssen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend
items.body: Excellent quality. Soft and incredibly comfortable Read more
items.author: jenny byrd

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars One of the turtle necks ran much smaller than other two.
items.body: One of them runs extremely smaller than the other two. I could barely get it over my head and on. Immediately took it off. Disappointed because they are super soft and comfy. Will try to get a partial refund. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Neck stretches out once pulled over head
items.body: Once you put it on the neck is stretched and won't go back to a fitted look, otherwise it's cute! Sized normal Read more
items.author: jackie wood

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ribbed Turtleneck
items.body: Love these! I am 5'9" and weight 175 lbs. The XL fit me great and I have a longer torso. They are on the thinner side which is perfect for the Panhandle of Florida winter weather. Would buy again. Read more
items.author: Julie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Army Green, Wine Red, Black, Black, Light Green, Pumpkin, Black, Khaki, Dark Brown, Black, Rose Red, Navy Blue, Khaki, Beige Apricot, Army Green, Light Blue, Light Purple, Light Green, Black, Khaki, Blue, Light Green, Light Purple, Brown, Rose Red, Green, Black, Black, Apricot, Khaki, Light Blue, Mocha, Black, Orange, Green, Light Gray, Black, Blue, Purple, Brown, Light Gray, Light Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
